item.title: Indonesian Simple Sentence Segmentation
item.description: Hi… ðŸ‘‹ It’s been a while since my last blogpost (it’s not a while, its a very long time tbh… ðŸ˜‚) but that’s fine I guess, been busy lately and I think a lil bit spare some time for writing (again) is a good for keeping the mood and my sanity LOL ðŸ¤– In this post, I will write a post about sentence-segmentation or sentence segmenter that I wrote years ago (around 2015-2016) during the time I am completing my master thesis.
